ImportantCharacter class that extends the Character class so that it can say different lines based on the stage the player is in.

Class constructor that initiates all the object's arrays, calls the superclass, and fills the stages array with negative values
Updates 4.0 - modified to initiate arrays and take in the number of stages

Static return method that returns an ArrayList of all the Characters in a level read from a file
Updates: 2.0 - changed the file being read from, added if statement to check if a character is important or not
3.0 - modified method to get the intro as well
4.0 - now reads and initializes all rooms, intros, and endings

Void method that allows the player to speak with an in-game character, viewing all of its dialogue lines
Updates: 2.0 - added the text variable, and called repaint() to paint the text in game
3.0 - added intro text and animation cancelling
4.0 - added endings, level switches, and phase switching
